title: # 294 - Jamie Kilstein & ME
description:
I sit down with Jamie Kilstein to talk about Aids, Jui Jitsu, social media, comedy, the Joe Rogan incident, divorce, and much more! 

Check out his podcast "The Jamie Kilstein Podcast" on iTunes and Stitcher. 

 

This episode is brought to you by Blue Apron. Get your first 3 meals free at www.blueapron.com/bertcast 

This episode is also brought to you by Leesa Mattresses. Try 100 nights risk free and get $125 off of a Leesa Mattress by going to www.leesa.com/bertcast 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH
click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
